description:
The tutorial covers standard Python and Open Source tools (pandas,
matplotlib, seaborn, R/ggplot, etc.) and recent innovations
(TsTables, bcolz, blaze, plot.ly) for financial time series analysis
and visualization. In addition, approaches are illustrated for high
performance I/O of high frequency financial data. It briefly sheds
light on the visualization of real-time/streaming financial data.

Slides available here: https://github.com/yhilpisch/pydlon15
title: Open Source Tools for Financial Time Series Analysis and Visualization
